attributes.action: Hold a 2nd referendum to rejoin the European Union to quicker reconcile £ loss
attributes.additional_details: Many of the promoters and creators of parliament even among the conservatives admit BREXIT was a mistake, many safety laws  scrapped need to be reinstated, leading to many injustices including Windrush and home-born EU students fight legal barriers that were not there to study at university. I feel the conservatives and Nigel Farage should pay a fine to EU restore relationship with the EU for its lies, Cameron and May regret BREXIT and need to pay the Windrush victims for their harmful policies.
attributes.background: Rejoin referendums needs to be reconciled every year until we rejoin the EU permanently even if Labour loses the next general election this policy must be made permanent and the Tories and Nigel Farage need to apologise to the EU  and world and pay a fine to EU he government for promoting BREXIT

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Apply to Rejoin the EU as soon as possible to increase growth in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749128

Commit to a referendum in May 2028 asking the next government to rejoin the EU
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747385
